overview:
Andreas Jacob is an internet pioneer following the launch of his first commercial internet project in the early 1990s. He has worked in the IT industry for over 20 years and has a proven track record in bringing new products and services to the market.

Andreas is a co-founder and managing partner of AVANTEC AG, which has risen to become the leading IT security integrator in Switzerland. He is also a co-founder of Sysformance AG, an Internet performance monitoring company, and a co-founder of DSwiss AG. Andreas Jacob holds a degree in electrical engineering from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich (ETH).
